title: [support/help] Can't log on league after random disconnect!
body: I was just playing rank with my friend who lives in the same state as me (not same area) and we both d/c at the same time, I sat there for 5 minutes thinking I was just lagging or something so then I decided to leave to reconnect but I cant seem to log in its just been saying "authenticating" after signing in. It can't be my internet because I'm using it just fine, speed test also says its fine, I honestly don't know whats going on. I would like a response or investigation please.

replies.body:
Personally, I think you two were just doing so well in your duo that you broke the client XD.

Jokes aside, it's odd that you both were d/c'd at the same time. It possible that the specific game server you were playing on had a slight hiccup, but let's be sure to check things on your side first to make sure we hit all our options. Follow the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure you're able to get a solid connection with our game servers.
Soooooooooooo is there any correlation with the provider? I'm a Comcast/Xfinity customer. Anyone else having these issues have the same provider?

Same here, man. My login screen is stuck on authenticating...

Definitely something going on client/server related, but my buddy who I was duo queuing with from Denver is having no issues.
